com.squareup.pagerduty.incidents

Class FakePagerDuty

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.squareup.pagerduty.incidents.PagerDuty
      • com.squareup.pagerduty.incidents.FakePagerDuty

  • public final class FakePagerDuty
extends PagerDuty
    A fake implementation of PagerDuty that keeps track of open and closed incidents in memory.
